meanings.sent1: She reloans her books to friends after reading them.
meanings.sent2: The bank reloans money to customers who have paid off their previous loans.
meanings.sent3: The library reloans the same book to the same person multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity reloans hope to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The cycle of reloans keeps the community connected and supported.

meanings.sent1: He reloans his favorite movies from the video store every weekend.

meanings.sent4: Her curiosity reloans knowledge from various sources.
meanings.sent5: The cycle of reloans allows for continuous learning and exploration.
